messages.content: Enjoying Mummers. I'm from Philly. I kind of terrified as they just used Skyrim music....
By all means, go for it. We'll all be much happier when you're not dragging us down anymore.
You must be ecstatic, I'm really happy for you.
So he is half decent. Glad to see your finally making some sense.
I'm really happy he and [NAME] are finding success
I'm glad you have your kids, but have you seen Brooklyn 99 like the op stated? It's worth living for too.
It's good though because itll make you cherish the happy times while youre in them, instead of lookinf back on them.
Ah yes I used to enjoy those. Before the dark times. Before the days of a FOX less Netflix.
Super glad this is now all nice and official! Really looking forward to working the NGS peeps!
I am generally a happy person. If you like to pay millions of dollars to semi-literates to represent your government, it's up to you!
Glad you enjoyed man, yeah it was pretty spontaneous too, I was praying I wasnt about to pull some bartard move and get jammed lol.
I enjoy that general area. Sections 203-205 are good sections pricewide and view wise
I'm so glad you have access to that trans group. You will make friends and be able to support each other.
Monero enthusiast here. Make me happy and call me a liar again.
Enjoy :) You won't regret it. The first couple seasons will be a little confusing but wiki helped me understand this show a lot!
no phone in the site, just some dragons enjoying the moment
YAAAS! Even though you're a stranger on the internet, this has made my day.
Glad I'm not the only one
Way to go! I know who this couple is! they appear really happy!
My fiancé and I went to a friends house and just hung out until midnight and watched fireworks, it was so chill and perfect!
Omg I thought you were paraphrasing. I'm so happy that those were the exact words they said.
So happy for your strong stance and to help him on his way out of your life.
nice to see that more special needs are out in the work force. go get em pal.
I'm glad you made a Reddit account to inform us how much you totes don't care bro
Personally really enjoyed it. Have it in my top 3 AC games with AC2 and Black Flag in there too.
Wow... I’m so glad that my dog is lazy like me.
Glad you came to your senses. Go feel uncomfortable about Lola bunny in Space Jam again.
Cool! Glad to see some cooperation.
Reading this made me happy and I don't even know you. Keep doing your thing!🙌🏼
I’ll be honest I really don’t care. I’m happy to know that others care about this, but eh you do you
